title: Data Ethics & Privacy
subject: Data Science
theory: Algorithms affect real lives. Bias in training data leads to biased models (e.g., Sexist hiring bot). Privacy laws (GDPR) restrict data usage.

examples.explanation: Example: A loan algorithm rejecting applicants based on zip code (proxy for race).

interview_questions.question: How do you mitigate bias?
interview_questions.answer: Diverse training data, fairness metrics, auditing features (removing proxies), and explainable AI.

summary: With great power comes great responsibility.
